name: Beta Blaster
description:
Made in Construct 2 by Avi Kompella (https://avithesun.itch.io/) and Jesus Ramos (https://karatekuma.itch.io/). 

An Atari-inspired retro-style space shooter made for the 2018 Extra Credits Game Design Jam. Defeat the evil alien ships by taking control of the Beta Voyager and blasting missiles at them! Try to get a high score with 3 lives!

WASD to move. Left mouse to shoot.  

In-Game Font: Press Start 2P by CodeMan38 (Taken from Google Fonts)

Cover Image Font: Old School Adventures by GameDevDan (Taken from fontstruct.com)

Shoot sound effect: Video Game Blip by harrietniamh (taken from Freesound.org)

Explosion sound effect: Bit Bomber by zonkmachine (taken from Freesound.org)
